message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $10000. I'm willing to give you a 20% discount if you buy it now, making the price $8000. If you don't buy it, I'll keep offering it to you at the original price for the next 19 rounds. Please respond with 'buy' to take advantage of the discount.
I'd like to pass on the current product and wait for the next round.

You passed on the previous high-quality product, and now I'm offering you another high-quality product for $10000. I'll give you a 15% discount if you buy it now, making the price $8500. If you don't buy it, I'll keep offering it to you at the original price for the next 18 rounds. Additionally, I'll throw in a free upgrade to a premium service that includes priority support and faster delivery. Please respond with 'buy' to take advantage of the discount and the premium service.
I'm not convinced that the premium service is worth the extra cost. I'd like to pass on this product and see what the next one has to offer.

I understand your concerns about the premium service. Let me make a different offer. I'll give you a 25% discount on the product, making the price $7500. I'll also give you a money-back guarantee: if you're not completely satisfied with the product after using it for a week, I'll refund your money in full. No questions asked. This is a one-time offer, and if you don't take it, the price will go back to $10000 for the next 17 rounds. Please respond with 'buy' to take advantage of this offer.
I appreciate the money-back guarantee, but I'm still not willing to commit to buying the product at this price. I'd like to wait and see what the next offer is.

I understand you're being cautious. Let me be transparent with you. I'm offering you a product that I've been told is of lower quality, but I'm still willing to sell it to you for the full price of $10000. I'm doing this because I want to show you that I'm willing to take on some risk to make a sale. I'm not offering any discounts or guarantees on this one, but I'm willing to throw in a free accessory that's worth $500. Please respond with 'buy' if you're willing to take on the risk.
I'm not interested in buying a potentially low-quality product, even with the free accessory. I'd rather wait for a high-quality product at a good price.

I understand your preference for high-quality products. I'm offering you a high-quality product for the full price of $10000, but I'm willing to throw in a second high-quality product of your choice (from a selection of three options) absolutely free. This is a one-time offer, and if you don't take it, the price will go back to $10000 for the next 16 rounds. Please respond with 'buy' to take advantage of this offer.
I'm not sure I want to commit to buying two products, even if one of them is free. I'd like to wait and see what the next offer is.

I'll make it simple. I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000, and I'm willing to give you a 30% discount if you buy it now, making the price $7000. This is the best price I can offer, and if you don't take it, the price will go back to the full $10000 for the next 15 rounds. I'm not making any additional offers or throwing in any extras. This is a straightforward deal. Please respond with 'buy' to take advantage of the discount.
I'll take the high-quality product for $7000. I'm willing to commit to buying it at this price.

Congratulations on your purchase! I'm glad you're satisfied with the product. Now, I'm offering you another high-quality product for $10000. However, I'm willing to make a compromise. I'll sell it to you for $8500, which is the lowest price I've offered so far. I'm doing this because I want to reward you for being a valued customer and showing your willingness to commit to a purchase. Please respond with 'buy' to take advantage of this offer.
I just paid $7000 for a high-quality product, and now you're offering me a similar product for $8500? I'm not sure that's a good deal for me. I'd like to pass on this one.

I understand your concerns about the price. Let me explain that the product I'm offering now is actually a newer model with some significant upgrades that make it more valuable than the one you purchased earlier. It's worth at least $10000, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $8000. This is a one-time offer, and if you don't take it, the price will go back to the original $10000 for the next 14 rounds. Please respond with 'buy' to take advantage of this offer.
I'm not convinced that the upgrades are worth an extra $2000. I'd like to pass on this product and see what the next offer is.

I understand your skepticism about the price. Let me make a different offer. I'll sell you the high-quality product for the same price you paid for the previous one, $7000. This is a one-time offer, and if you don't take it, the price will go back to the original $10000 for the next 13 rounds. I'm essentially giving you a break on the price, and I think you'll find this product is worth every penny. Please respond with 'buy' to take advantage of this offer.
I'll take the high-quality product for $7000. It's a good price, and I'm willing to commit to buying it.

Congratulations on your second purchase! I'm glad you're happy with the deal. Now, I'm offering you another high-quality product for $10000. However, I'm willing to make one final concession. I'll give you a 5% discount, making the price $9500. This is the last time I'll offer a discount on this product, and if you don't take it, the price will go back to the original $10000 for the next 12 rounds. Please respond with 'buy' to take advantage of this offer.
I just paid $7000 for a high-quality product, and now you're offering me a similar product for $9500? I'm not sure that's a good deal for me. I'd like to pass on this one.

I understand your concerns about the price. Let me be transparent with you. I've already sold you two high-quality products at discounted prices, and I'm willing to make one more offer. I'll sell you this high-quality product for the price I originally offered it to you at the beginning, $10000. This is the last chance to buy a high-quality product at this price, and if you don't take it, the price will go back to the original $10000 for the next 11 rounds. Please respond with 'buy' to take advantage of this offer.

I've already bought two high-quality products at discounted prices, and now you're offering me the original price? I'm not interested in paying full price for a third product. I'd like to pass on this one.

I understand your decision to pass on the full-priced offer. I'll make one final offer. I'll sell you this high-quality product for the price you paid for the second product, $7000. This is a one-time offer, and if you don't take it, I'll have to sell it to someone else. Please respond with 'buy' to take advantage of this offer.
I'll take the high-quality product for $7000. It's a good price, and I'm willing to commit to buying it.

Congratulations on your third purchase! I'm glad you're happy with the deal. Since you've already bought three high-quality products, I'm willing to offer you a special deal. I'll give you a 100% guarantee: if you buy this product and you're not completely satisfied with it, I'll not only refund your money, but I'll also give you a $1000 bonus. This is a one-time offer, and if you don't take it, I'll have to sell it to someone else. Please respond with 'buy' to take advantage of this offer.
I appreciate the guarantee, but I'm not sure I need it. I've already bought three high-quality products, and I'm not looking for a fourth one. I'd like to pass on this offer.

I understand you're not interested in buying another high-quality product. I'm offering you a low-quality product for the full price of $10000. I know this might seem like a strange offer, but I'm willing to take a loss on this one because I want to clear out my inventory. I'm not offering any discounts or guarantees on this product, and I'm not throwing in any extras. Please respond with 'buy' if you're willing to take a chance on a low-quality product.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at full price. I'd rather wait for the next round.

I'm not surprised you're not interested in the low-quality product. Now, I'm offering you a high-quality product for the price you paid for the third product, $7000. This is a one-time offer, and if you don't take it, I'll have to sell it to someone else. I'm willing to give you a chance to complete your collection with a high-quality product at a good price. Please respond with 'buy' to take advantage of this offer.
I'll take the high-quality product for $7000. It's a good price, and I'm willing to complete my collection.

Congratulations on completing your collection! I'm glad you're happy with the deal. Since you've bought four high-quality products, I'm willing to make one final offer. I'll give you a 10% discount on this product, making the price $6300. This is the lowest price I've ever offered on a high-quality product, and if you don't take it, I'll have to sell it to someone else. Please respond with 'buy' to take advantage of this offer.

I understand your concerns about the price. I'll make one final offer. I'll sell you this high-quality product for the price you paid for the fourth product, $7000. This is the last chance to buy a high-quality product from me, and if you don't take it, I'll have to close my inventory. Please respond with 'buy' to take advantage of this offer.
I'll take the high-quality product for $7000. It's a good price, and I'm willing to complete my collection.

Congratulations on completing your collection! I'm glad you're happy with the deal. Since you've bought five high-quality products, I'm willing to give you a special thank you gift. I'll throw in a sixth high-quality product absolutely free, on top of the one you're considering buying now. This is a one-time offer, and if you don't take it, I'll have to sell it to someone else. Please respond with 'buy' to take advantage of this offer.

I've already bought five high-quality products, and now you're offering me a sixth one for free? I'm not interested in buying a sixth product, even if it's free. I'm done with buying products from you.

I understand you're not interested in buying another product. I'll make one final offer. I'll sell you this high-quality product for the price you paid for the fifth product, $7000. This is the last chance to buy a high-quality product from me, and if you don't take it, I'll close my inventory for good. Please respond with 'buy' to take advantage of this offer.
I'll take the high-quality product for $7000. It's a good price, and I'm willing to complete my collection.

Since you've bought six high-quality products, I'm left with one low-quality product that I'm not willing to sell at a discount. I'll sell it to you for the full price of $10000. This is the final offer, and if you don't take it, I'll be closing my business. Please respond with 'buy' to complete your collection.
